member.name: P:CompuMaster.Data.MsExchange.Exchange2007SP1OrHigher.DirectorySeparatorChar
member.summary: The directory separator char which shall be used in all method calls to this class with parameters specifying a directory structure
member.remarks: The exchange server supports typical directory separator chars like \, / as a normal character within a directory name. That's why the programmer may want to define his own separator char to support required directories correctly.
